channel.title: ssh on Orange
channel.description: Recent content in ssh on Orange

item.title: SSH connection issue
item.description: I always encounter some ssh issue. Resource temporarily unavailable One day… > ssh -T git@github.com ssh: connect to host ssh.github.com port 22: Resource temporarily unavailable so there are several assumptions: windows firewall block port 22 I do not generate ssh key for my github account I do not configure my config file properly SSH dies I suggest following the steps below: restart ssh sudo service ssh restart reinstall ssh sudo apt-get remove openssh-server sudo apt-get install openssh-server generate ssh key for you github account generate ssh key
